website_summaries.verdict: Simple sensor that fits on the end of the club to measure all aspects of your swing. Offered at a reasonable price point.
pros: Works for both full swing shots and for putting strokes
Automatically tracks data measurements, so you aren't interrupted during your golf game
Sends data to a smartphone app so you can see the results, but sensors will store data when the smartphone is out of range
cons: Kit only contains one sensor, so you must share it between clubs

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice and lots of info
customer_reviews.text: Blast golf gives lots of info. It does drain your cell phone battery, but that is what chargers are for. You can buy extra sensors instead of swithching them on your clubs, but switching is easy. I learned from tech support that any Blast sensor works with any other Blast product, like baseball, softball, basketball, performance, and golf. I found basketball cheap ($30 complete) and used the sensor (and extra charger) as an extra for Blast Golf. A very good product. Not perfect, but worth it. Easy to switch clubs with it.
customer_reviews.author: imollyq

customer_reviews.title: interesting but more geared toward putting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to get some help with driving but it seems that the majority of videos are geared toward putting and the driving videos are pretty generic, not very helpful, as are the stats themselves. I wish there were some better explanations of what the stats mean, how they are measured and how to improve the metric. Also the sensor and the rubber fitting doesn't fit my putter or my driver and tends to slip and shift after a few swings.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Using it every day to improve my putting.
customer_reviews.text: Using this device to improve my putting. So far the software is very good. Phone connects to sensor via Bluetooth. Lots of metrics available on your putting stroke. Software tracks and trends your metrics over time. Software includes improvement videos and practice drills. Quick response from customer service....software would not recognize sensor initially. I emailed Blast Golf customer support and they responded within an hour with a fix. Can be used with all your clubs not just putter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept however you can't put on a tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept however you can't put on a tablet or computer only the phone. Let me know when you create on for other applications
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and offers  a lot of interesting stats
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool data gatherer. I call to the company for help a couple of times but didn't get an answer until a day or two latter. Nevertheless their are a lot of great videos available.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Foo

customer_reviews.title: Sensor works 1 out of 10 times ... disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The sensor seldom worked for me. I contracted customer support, reset the sensor, remained still for 3-5 seconds between putts and I still could not get performance of the sensor to improve. Very frustrating putting over 100 putts and only registering 25-30 total. Very disappointed as I was fairly excited to use this and compile the data.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Captured less than 10% of my swings
customer_reviews.text: This product just doesn't work at all. Every step in the set up process was frustrating, and then once I finally got the sensor connected to the app, it rarely registered my swings. Of the roughly 100 putts I tried this with, it only registered 6 of them. I tried the app on my Samsung S20 and my wife's iPhone 11 and had issues with both versions of the app.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bonefeste

customer_reviews.title: Limited factors of measurements
customer_reviews.text: The number of factors it measured is limited. The Primary metrics are the club head speed, back swing and forward swing. It perhaps be enhanced to measure items like my club face on contact, whether I am hitting in to out or out to in etc.
customer_reviews.author: Powlook Yap

customer_reviews.title: Blast-making it easy to adjust my putting stroke
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. It does everything it says it would. I have mainly used it with my Putter so far and found the feedback the app gives very useful. My Putting has certainly improved since I started training with Blast. I found the Rotation Change very useful. On average I was closing my club face by 1.5°, not much but at 10' that's the difference from hitting the hole or missing.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Blast Golf analyser
customer_reviews.text: Seems Précise for putting strokes with 11 metrics. Doesn't support chips and wedging ! Only 6 metrics for full swing ! 10 and more listed on the notice...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: App does not help you understand the data
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly written app and does not help you understand the data it collects. It won’t help you
customer_reviews.author: K. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. However you should seriously think of discontinuing Aramex courier as they are unprofessional and not dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Madan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is total crap. The iOS interface is designed poorly and good luck getting technical support. It frequently disconnects and reconnects and then doesn't connect at all. When it does work it gives useless information which competitive products offer a significant advantage on. Did I mention the application is terrible??
customer_reviews.author: MAGA

customer_reviews.title: Fixing the sensor with the figure references aligned feet to toe of the club
customer_reviews.text: The video has to mention how important it is the sensor is aligned the right way
customer_reviews.author: PHILIPPE

customer_reviews.title: All in all I like the concept but
customer_reviews.text: Interesting golf tool. I just cannot reconcile its readings with my known swing speeds. Should be a way to adjust or calibrate. I have recently spent 3 hours on Trackman with Callaway Pro fitting a driver and the results from Blast just do not match up. (I mean not much problem with 98 to 100 reading 95/96 but not 83) You can put this on any club and on the putter it does give you tempo swing but, I would be looking for take-away angle and impact angle. The charged is induction and seems to take forever. All in all I like the concept but, does not really work for me.
customer_reviews.author: JImmy

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with my Blast Golf Analyzer and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Flatman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, except it doesn't exactly come with directions
customer_reviews.text: Great product, except it doesn't exactly come with directions. Also, I would suggest buying the sensor holder that goes on your glove, because the little rubber piece that attaches to each club is quite annoying when trying to quickly switch clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Asieding

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty dissapoined with this product. Turned on and off over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, but could not reliablely connect to my cell phone. Samsung GALAXY S 6 active
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as it sounds.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this. I's a great idea and has potential if it worked well. It gives some good information, but not enough to have value and only captured about 40% of the strokes. I also tried to update the device with the latest update, but it didn't work and still does not. I reached out to the company for help and they said they would send me a replacement, but never heard back from them or never got the new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Chimon

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies curiosity but not much else
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing device which delivers some rather meaningless statistics for an average amateur golfer. For example, the ratio of the speed of back swing to forward swing with a putter should be 2.5 : 1 ?? Oh really, mine is apparently 2.3 : 1 and I still need convincing that the difference explains why I too often miss the cup from within 6 feet!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered without grip attachments.
customer_reviews.text: The description on the box says that the product includes a standard grip attachment and an oversized putter attachment. Neither was included in the sealed box/package I received.
customer_reviews.author: pfelser

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant device, for working on putting timing it is fantastic but a couple of issues: The full swing data is lacking and seems to use its own terminology. The Android app doesn't include graphical stats and it doesn't sync to cloud correctly...
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Clock Went Bonkers
customer_reviews.text: This clocked worked fine for 6 months and then it went bonkers. The clock worked at first but the buttons were always fidgety and it was not easy to use. Then it started going crazy, was turning off and on by itself, to include the radio in the middle of the night. Tried different outlets and took out the batteries, but nothing solved it. Found its way into a trash can eventually.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate, but decent.
customer_reviews.text: Unit works half the time, but when it does it gives you a good report on your swing. I wish it was implemented better onto the club.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisMichigan

customer_reviews.title: very useful golf training tool
customer_reviews.text: very useful golf training tool. now i was able to identify what to focus and validate if there are improvement with my game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A mistake
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my golf grips.....I can't use it. Would like to send it back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: ONLY for SUPER NEW APPLE
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fully realize that this is ONLY for iPhone. The product description said that a release for Android was expected for last fall but never happened. So when I received this item we couldn't even load it on our couple year old iPod touch bc apparently its too old and its not compatible with this. Apparently you must have a super new iPhone to get this thing to operate. It seemed like a really cool device and I was sorely disappointed. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works + numbers are resonable - some things need improvement
customer_reviews.author: Kai Wendland

customer_reviews.title: Epic piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Junk, installed on my Samsung galaxy S5 and it doesn't connect to the sensor, they sent me a new sensor, and that one doesn't work either. Since i'ts been a few months since I bought it, I cant return it either. I also tried installing the software on several other phones (we have 6 in our house) and it doesn't work on those either. I also noticed the positive reviews on Amazon are mostly non verified and within a couple of days of each other which leads me to believe they are totally bogus. This thing is a piece of crap of epic proportions. Customer service is nice, but who wants great customer service for a dog turd.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Frideres

customer_reviews.title: Real time feedback
customer_reviews.text: Very Cool for real time feedback on my putting tempo. I haven't been to the range with it yet, but I am looking forward to seeing my swing metrics with video.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this to work on your game
customer_reviews.text: great tool for working on posture and address Needs to have some "editing tools" or the ability to send directly to the computer. Also, would be perfect if it would connect to two devices simultaneously
customer_reviews.author: NGoff

product_meta.title: Blast Motion Golf Swing Analyzer I Captures Putting, Full Swing, with NEW Short Game and Bunker Modes I Slo-Mo Video Capture I App Enabled, iOS and Android Compatible (900-00036)
product_meta.description: Get tips and drills from expert coaches and PGA Tour Players with Blast Golf, the complete swing and stroke solution. Improve your timing and make more putts with this real-time stroke and swing analyzer. Get immediate feedback by attaching the smart sensor to the grip of any putter, driver, iron, or wedge. Used by over 200 players and coaches on the PGA, European, Champions, LPGA, and Web.com tours, Blast Golf tracks and analyzes your swing for game-changing results. The information is automatically captured and sent to a smart phone app (iOS and Android compatible). Easy to understand metrics, allow you to analyze your swing in slow motion to improve timing, tempo, speed, face rotation, and more. The proprietary Smart Video Capture automatically creates videos and highlights to track metrics over time to identify trends for improvement. Sharing results with your friends has never been easier—instantly share metrics and videos on Facebook, Twitter, and E-mail through the app. Whether you are novice or expert golfer, Blast Golf is the ideal resource to help you improve every shot.
feature_bullets: Blast Golf is the complete swing and stroke solution for golfers at every level. Blast Golf provides accurate metrics and valuable insights for every part of your game.

BLAST ATHLETES - Over 200 players & their coaches on the PGA, European, Champions, LPGA, and Web.com Tours trust Blast Golf as a must have tool in their daily toolbox. Simple to use, with game changing results.
TECH MADE EASY - The Blast Swing Analyzer attaches to the end of any club. Blast’s natural motion capture allows golfers to swing the club or roll some putts and forget about the technology.

SMART VIDEO CAPTURE – Record and automatically clip video of each swing. View and analyze your swing in slow motion with metrics overlaid. Leverage the in-app Training Center for tips and drills from expert coaches and PGA Tour Players.
CAPTURE AND ANALYZE – Full swing, Short Game, Bunker and Putting stroke metrics for every shot. Track performance and gain valuable insights about swing tendencies.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
